T02D2690:9a-42: pa'i mun pas 'od rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir
T02D2690:9a-43: ro // skar ma dang nyi ma dang zla ba mi snang zhing 'od dang mi ldan pa ni /
T02D2690:9a-44: mun pa'i sprin chen pos bkab pa'o /
T02D2690:9a-46: lhar nger ma yin zhing 'od mi gsal bar gyur
T02D2690:9a-47: to zhes bya ba ni 'od rnams mi 'byung zhing
T02D2690:9a-48: gzi brjid mi gsal bas te /
T02D2690:9a-49: shes rab can rnams shes rab dang bral bar gyur ba'o //
T02D2690:9a-50: des na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:9b-0: de rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi nus @9b mthu bstan pa'o //
T02D2690:9b-1: yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba ni /
T02D2690:9b-2: litstsha b'i 'byung bos btab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2690:9b-3: yangs pa can gyi grong khyer zhes bya ba ni yul dbus nyid do //
T02D2690:9b-4: li tstsha b'i kha cig gis grong gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni bram ze'i grong khyer la bya'o //
T02D2690:9b-5: grong khyer gang yin ba de zhes bya ba ni
T02D2690:9b-6: ma ga dh'a dang bram ze'i grong gnyis la bya'o
T02D2690:9b-7: // gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur ces bya ba
T02D2690:9b-8: ni grong khyer de gnyis ka'i mi rnams la 'byung
T02D2690:9b-9: po'i nad sna tshogs byung bas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2690:9b-10: // // grong gi gzhon nu rnams zhes bya ba
T02D2690:9b-11: ni rtsis mkhan dang ni gtsug lag mkhan pos mi
T02D2690:9b-12: // // zin pa / mig rno dang mo ma rnams kyis kyang mo mi zin pa'o //
T02D2690:9b-13: blon po dang ni blon pos kyang rgyal po la
T02D2690:9b-14: zhu ba phul mi nus shing nad kyis btab pa'o
T02D2690:9b-15: // blon po chen po dang ni gong bzhin du'o //
T02D2690:9b-21: g-yog kha cig kyang gdon zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis btab nas /
T02D2690:9b-27: lhog pa la sogs pa'i nad ma rungs pa mang po byung ba'o //
T02D2690:9b-28: 'byung pos btab par gyur zhes bya ba yan chod ni /
T02D2690:9b-33: sha za la sogs pa rnams bram ze li tstsha b'is bskrad pas ma thub pa'i phyir //
T02D2690:9b-34: grong de'i mi rnams la nad sna tshogs byung ba'i phyir 'jigs pa'o //
T02D2690:9b-35: yul yangs pa can gyi ljongs /
T02D2690:9b-39: dge bsnyen ma dang zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la dad pas skyabs su 'gro ba'o //
T02D2690:9b-40: skyi bung zhes bya ba ni drag tu 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2690:9b-41: 'jigs skrag sngangs te skyi bung zhes bya ba ni
T02D2690:9b-42: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dad par
T02D2690:9b-44: sems can gyi sdug bsngal thos nas sems stong nas lus 'dar bar gyur te /
T02D2690:9b-45: ngag gis kyang bzlas pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'o //
T02D2690:9b-46: kha gnam du bltas shing du 'bod do zhes bya
T02D2690:9b-47: ba ni dus ma yin pa'i ser ba dang char
T02D2690:10a-0: @10a * // pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab pas 'jigs pa'o //
T02D2690:10a-1: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal
T02D2690:10a-2: zhes bya ba ni gus par de rnams kyis kyang
T02D2690:10a-4: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2690:10a-5: bra ma ze'i khyim dag ces bya ba nas mchod
T02D2690:10a-6: rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag 'tshal
T02D2690:10a-7: zhes bya ba ni lta ba log pa'i phyir rang
T02D2690:10a-8: dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bas mun nag zhi
T02D2690:10a-10: gang dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2690:10a-11: bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze
T02D2690:10a-12: dang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten mi rigs mi
T02D2690:10a-13: gcig pa / mu stegs kyi chos la dga' ba ste /
T02D2690:10a-14: de rnams kyang lta ba mi gcig pa sum brgya drug cu po yang /
T02D2690:10a-15: de las bsdus pa drug ste /
T02D2690:10a-16: snying rje med cing gab pa dang /
T02D2690:10a-18: byol song la gus pa dang /
T02D2690:10a-22: de las bsdus pa gnyis te /
T02D2690:10a-24: khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la
T02D2690:10a-25: phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni rtag par lta zhing
T02D2690:10a-27: kha cig ni brgya byin la zhes bya ba ni
T02D2690:10a-28: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la lta zhing 'dod pa'i yon
T02D2690:10a-30: kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba la phyag 'tshal
T02D2690:10a-31: zhes pa ni dbang dang mtho ris thob par 'dod
T02D2690:10a-32: pas tshe 'di dang phyi ma la bsrung ba dang
T02D2690:10a-34: kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang zhes pa
T02D2690:10a-35: ni dka' thub tu gnas pa yod par lta ba
T02D2690:10a-36: rnams so // khyim bdag ni so so'i lta ba'o //
T02D2690:10a-37: nor bu bzang po dang ni rtag par 'dod pa nor gyi don la gnas pa rnams so //
T02D2690:10a-39: 'phrog ma dang zhes pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang
T02D2690:10a-40: phyi ma la phun sum tshogs pa rtag par lta
T02D2690:10a-41: ba'o// nyi ma dang ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2690:10a-42: chad par lta ba rnams so //
T02D2690:10a-43: zla ba dang ni zhes pa ni bar ma de'i lta ba'o //
T02D2690:10a-44: skar ma dang ni zhes pa ni gnyis la gtogs pa'o //
T02D2690:10a-45: gza' dang zhes pa ni mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i lta bar gnas pa'o //
T02D2690:10b-5: mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag
T02D2690:10b-6: 'tshal zhing zhes pa ni lta ba gci ka pa
T02D2690:10b-7: de rnams / gnas de rnams su phyin nas /
T02D2690:10b-9: smon lam la sogs pa 'debs pa'o / bdag cag
T02D2690:10b-10: ni 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pas 'jigs pa'i gnas nas
T02D2690:10b-11: ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod
T02D2690:10b-12: pa dag ces bya ba ni so so'i lta ba
T02D2690:10b-13: mi gcig pa'i lha rnams la /
T02D2690:10b-14: de skad du smras nas rang gi yi dam la gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D2690:10b-15: bcom ldan 'das ni bshad zin to //
T02D2690:10b-16: grong khyer yangs pa can gyi mun pa 'byung ba'i gnas skabs te gnyis pa'o /
T02D2690:10b-18: // / spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs zhes bya ba
T02D2690:10b-19: ni thugs rje'i spyan gyis sems can la gzigs pa'o
T02D2690:10b-20: // de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2690:10b-21: mngon par 'du mdzad do zhes bya ba yan chod
T02D2690:10b-22: ni dam pa'i chos mngon par bshad pa yin te
T02D2690:10b-23: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul zhes
T02D2690:10b-24: bya ba ni gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgyar sprul
T02D2690:10b-25: ba'i sku bye ba phrag brgyar sprul pa'o //
T02D2690:10b-26: mngon par 'du mdzad pas mngon par 'du mdzad pa
T02D2690:10b-27: zhes bya ba ni gang la gang gis 'dul bde
T02D2690:10b-28: la de dang de'i ngo bor snang ba'o //
T02D2690:10b-29: de tsug yin par ci shes na /
T02D2690:10b-31: gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa //
T02D2690:10b-32: ston pa'i glang po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2690:10b-33: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2690:10b-34: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
T02D2690:10b-35: pa / 'jig rten gyi khams ni gsum ste /
T02D2690:10b-37: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa stong /
T02D2690:10b-38: rgyal chen rigs bzhi nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du stong spyi phud do //
T02D2690:10b-39: de stong la stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi kham so //
T02D2690:10b-40: stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong la /
T02D2690:10b-41: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi kham chen po'o //
T02D2690:10b-42: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
T02D2690:10b-43: 'jig rten dad par gyur te zhes bya ba ni
T02D2690:10b-45: ma dad pa dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
T02D2690:11a-0: kun rjod par byed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis dad pa smin par byed pa'i @11a * //
T02D2690:11a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang mi'i bar du 'dun par bcas pa'o //
T02D2690:11a-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:11a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba 'dun par mdzad pa de nas /
T02D2690:11a-5: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i lha ste /
T02D2690:11a-6: tshangs pa chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2690:11a-7: tshe tshad bskal ba drug cu thub /
T02D2690:11a-8: lus dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis /
T02D2690:11a-9: 'di man chad bsam gtan dang po'i rtog dpyod me
T02D2690:11a-10: dang 'dra bas me yis 'jig /'di yang bsam gtan
T02D2690:11a-11: dang po ste / tshang ba mdun na 'don gyi
T02D2690:11a-12: nges tsheg gong ma'i tshangs pa chen po'i spyan snga
T02D2690:11a-13: dang po ste / na / 'og ma 'gro drug gi las dge sdig gi smrang 'don pas /
T02D2690:11a-14: tshangs pa mdun na 'don zhes bya'o //
T02D2690:11a-15: yang na tshangs pa chen po la phan 'dogs pas tshangs ba nye phan zhes bya'o //
T02D2690:11a-16: yang na tshangs pa chen po la 'khor bas tshangs 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D2690:11a-17: tshe tshad bskal ba bzhi bcu thub /
T02D2690:11a-19: 'di yang bsam gtan dang po ste /
T02D2690:11a-20: tshangs ris kyi lha'i nges tshig 'og ma'i 'dod pa
T02D2690:11a-21: khams kyi 'khor ba gyod 'khrin 'dra ba las ni
T02D2690:11a-22: tshangs bas tshangs pa chen po'o //
T02D2690:11a-23: 'khor du tshangs ris tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi shu thub lus dpag tshad phyed do //
T02D2690:11a-24: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba
T02D2690:11a-25: ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang nye dbang sum
T02D2690:11a-26: cu rtsa gnyis / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs
T02D2690:11a-27: tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig las byas pa'i nang na
T02D2690:11a-28: cu rtsa gnyis / gnas / dga' pa'i tshal /
T02D2690:11a-32: grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba gnas so //
T02D2690:11a-33: ri rab kyi lcog gcig la /
T02D2690:11a-34: lag na rdo rje la gnod sbyin gyis bskor ba gnas so //
T02D2690:11a-35: ri rab gru bzhi kha tshon phyogs re re ra dpag tshad stong phrag bcu bcu yod do //
T02D2690:11a-36: rgyu rin chen bzhis byas pa'i steng 'di ni gser
T02D2690:11a-37: gyi sa gzhi shin tu bde zhing nyams dga' ba'o
T02D2690:11a-38: // rdo aa mo li ka'i steng na koo shi ka chos 'chad pa'o //
T02D2690:11a-39: shing yongs 'dus brtol yang dpag tshad lnga brgya yang skyes /
T02D2690:11a-40: dpag tshad lnga brgya mar zug / yan lag lnga pa yang dpag tshad drug cu yod do //
T02D2690:11b-0: de @11b la lha dang lha ma yin 'thab pa'o //
T02D2690:11b-1: sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'brul dbang byed kyi lha dang /
T02D2690:11b-2: 'phrul dga'i lha dang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams te /
T02D2690:11b-3: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi nges tshig ni 'og ma'i rdzu 'phrul dbang byed pas /
T02D2690:11b-5: tshe tshad dang mi lo stong drug brgya la lha'i zhag gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo drug stong thub /
T02D2690:11b-6: lus la rgyang grags bcu yod do //
T02D2690:11b-7: lha'i rgyal po la dbang byed pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do //
T02D2690:11b-8: 'phrul dga'i lha'i nges tshig ci 'dod pa rang gi lus las 'byung bas 'phrul dga'o //
T02D2690:11b-9: tshe tshad ni mi lo lnga brgya la /
T02D2690:11b-10: lha'i zhag gcig brtsis pa'i lo stong thub /
T02D2690:11b-11: lus la dpag tshad gcig bsam 'phel nor bu la longs spyod do //
T02D2690:11b-12: dga' ldan gyi lha'i nges tshig ni lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod dang bral pa'o //
T02D2690:11b-13: tshe ni mi lo nyis brgya la zhag gcig tu brtsis pa'i bzhi stong ngo //
T02D2690:11b-14: lus la rgyang grags bzhi yod /
T02D2690:11b-15: yang na lha'i rgyal po dga' ldan bya ba yod pas /
T02D2690:11b-17: lha mo dang lag pa sprad pas 'khrig /'di ni
T02D2690:11b-18: 'thab bral lha'i nges tshig ni lha ma yin gyi
T02D2690:11b-20: 'thab bral gyi lha'i khang bzangs ni ri rab steng na khyim yod /
T02D2690:11b-21: lha mo dang sbyor ba ni lus la 'khyud pa tsam gyis tshim /
T02D2690:11b-22: mi lo dgu pa tsam gyi tshod skye ste /
T02D2690:11b-23: tshe tshad ni mi lo nyis brgya la lha'i zhag gcig tu brtsis pa'i nyis stong thub po //
T02D2690:11b-24: lus la rgyang grags gnyis yod do //
T02D2690:11b-25: lha re re bsam 'phel nor bu re re la spyod do //
T02D2690:11b-26: sum cu rtsa gsum mi lo brgya la zhag gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong thub /
T02D2690:11b-27: lus tshad ni gzhu 'dom nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T02D2690:11b-28: rgyal po chen po bzhi zhes bya ba ni yul 'khor srung dang //
T02D2690:11b-32: rgyal chan rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:11b-33: sum cu rtsa gsum mi bzhin mi spyod /
T02D2690:11b-34: khye'u pha'i phrag pa g-yas pa las skye /
T02D2690:11b-35: bu mo ma'i brla las skye'o //
T02D2690:11b-36: gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:11b-38: ring po dang ni mig bzangs dang //
T02D2690:12a-2: nye shing dang ni seng ge dang //
T02D2690:12a-3: dus can dang ni dga' ba dang //
T02D2690:12a-4: seng ge ral ba can dang seng ge'o //
T02D2690:12a-5: bram dang ni ser skya dang //
T02D2690:12a-6: 'dzin pa dang ni 'dzin pa dag / rtsod skyod dang ni khyab 'jug go //
T02D2690:12a-7: lnga spyong dang ni tshigs lnga ser //
T02D2690:12a-8: ri mnyam dang ni gser can no //
T02D2690:12a-9: sa ba shin tu sa ba dang //
T02D2690:12a-10: nag po dang ni nye nag go //
T02D2690:12a-11: nyi ma zla ba me dang rlung //
T02D2690:12a-12: lus ngan gyi ni bu thu bo //
T02D2690:12a-13: kun du rgyal ba mi la zhon //
T02D2690:12a-14: phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste //
T02D2690:12a-16: gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po'o //
T02D2690:12a-17: de rnams kyis yongs su 'dren pa /
T02D2690:12a-19: 'od dang ldan pa kha dgo dang ldan pa /
T02D2690:12a-21: gnod sbyin stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni dbang po dang /
T02D2690:12a-41: gnod sbyin pa lang skyong dang /
T02D2690:12a-47: gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2690:12a-51: lcags mdung ring bo dang ma ldan te /
T02D2690:12a-52: gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin stobs po che chen po ste /
T02D2690:12a-53: sde rnams kyis yongs su 'dren pa /
T02D2690:12a-57: grags pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2690:12a-58: lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul dag kyang myong par byed pa dag go //
T02D2690:12a-59: 'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:12a-60: yab ni gnod sbyin chen po banytsi ka'o //
T02D2690:12a-61: bu ni lnga brgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor la sogs pa'o //
T02D2690:12a-62: 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa nas 'phrog ma'i bu yan chad do //
T02D2690:12a-63: kha dog ni so so'i kha dog go //
T02D2690:12a-64: 'phags pa dang ni rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal ba'o //
T02D2690:12b-0: @12b nub mo 'das zhes bya ba ni mun pa las 'das pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-1: yang na nub mo dang nyin mo khyad par med pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-2: dag ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2690:12b-3: lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa dag pas dag pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-5: nyon mongs pa lnga dang bral ba'o //
T02D2690:12b-6: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la ni so so'i 'od kyis khebs pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-8: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'od dang /
T02D2690:12b-9: mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te zhes
T02D2690:12b-10: bya ba ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i mthus bya
T02D2690:12b-11: rgod phung po la snang pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-12: bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:12b-15: 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-16: ga la ba der zhes bya ba ni spyan sngar ro //
T02D2690:12b-17: dong nas phyis ba dang zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa la sogs pas phyin pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni lha'i me tog dang /
T02D2690:12b-24: au du mw'a ra la sogs pa me tog gi char phab pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-25: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig tu tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dug pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-26: tshig gcig ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-27: ngag gcig ces bya ba ni thams cad mthun pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-28: dbyangs gcig ces bya ba ni so so'i bstod pas mthun pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-29: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par
T02D2690:12b-30: bstod pa zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2690:12b-34: zhes pa ni dper na gser mkhan gyis gser sbyangs pa'i 'od dang 'dra bas te /
T02D2690:12b-35: yang na nyi ma bdun gyi 'od dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2690:12b-36: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs //
T02D2690:12b-37: zhes bya ba ni 'od dang mnyam pa ste /
T02D2690:12b-38: dper na zla ba bsil bar byed pa bzhin du /
T02D2690:12b-39: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'o //
T02D2690:12b-40: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni gnyis ldan te /
T02D2690:12b-43: 'jig rten pa'i dpal ni 'jig rten la grags pa'o //
T02D2690:13a-1: 'das pa'i dpal ni gnyis su med pa ste so so ma yin no //
T02D2690:13a-2: rnam thos kyi bu bzhin brtan zhes pa ni dper
T02D2690:13a-3: na rnam thos kyi bu'i nor la sogs pa zad
T02D2690:13a-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan zad mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2690:13a-6: rin chen rnams kyi 'byung gnas lags //
T02D2690:13a-7: zhes bya ba ni dper na yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2690:13a-8: bu rin po che bzhin du dgos 'dod 'byung ba'o

T02D2690:30a-16: thub sku gser gyi kha dog la //

T02D2690:30a-34: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di /

T02D2690:30b-15: khyed cag snying las chung byed pa //

T02D2690:30b-24: tshangs pa dang ni thub chen po //

T02D2690:30b-31: ro // bdag gis ri rab bsgul byas shing //

T02D2690:92b-20: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa de dag la //
T02D2690:92b-21: lha gang mngon par dang ba rab tu yod pa yi //
T02D2690:92b-22: zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
T02D2690:92b-23: ldan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D2690:92b-24: pa'o // lha de mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dga' gyur nas //
T02D2690:92b-25: zhes bya ba ni bka' de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis thams cad dga' zhing bde bar gyur pa'o ;
T02D2690:92b-26: / rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis bdag la srung du gsol //
T02D2690:92b-27: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis kyang /
T02D2690:92b-28: sems can thams cad bsrung ba ste //
T02D2690:92b-29: dam pa'i chos 'di gus par byas na ni /
T02D2690:92b-31: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D2690:92b-32: lan cig phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T02D2690:92b-33: 'jig rten na yang dag par song pa dang /
T02D2690:92b-34: yang dag par zhugs pa dang 'jig rten na dgra bcom ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'o //
T02D2690:92b-35: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang /
T02D2690:92b-36: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i zhing khams thob pa ste /
T02D2690:92b-37: de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
T02D2690:93a-0: @93a * // rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang yin no //
T02D2690:93a-1: lha tshe ring po'i yul du mi skye ba dang /
T02D2690:93a-2: mtha' 'khob dang rigs ngan gyi yul du mi skye
T02D2690:93a-3: ba dang chom rkun dang rkun ma dang ngan song
T02D2690:93a-4: gsum nas thar pa dang de dag kyang rig sngags
T02D2690:93a-5: la dad pa skyes pa yin no //
T02D2690:93a-6: de'i tshe na lha dang mi'i yul dang ;
T02D2690:93a-7: 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na bram ze 'am rgyal rigs sam /
T02D2690:93a-8: gang gi rigs bzang ba la skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2690:93a-9: nam skyes pa'i dus su yang chos 'di dang 'grogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2690:93a-10: da lta'i tshe na yang 'jigs pa las skyob pa dang /
T02D2690:93a-11: sba ba dang srung ba dang mtshams gcod pa la sogs par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2690:93a-13: rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang /
T02D2690:93a-14: byad dang ro langs dang dug dang dug sbyor ba dang /
T02D2690:93a-15: sbod gtong dang sngags dang 'byung po rnams kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2690:93a-16: bsod snyoms kyi cho ga'i gnas skabs te bcu drug pa'o /
T02D2690:93a-19: // / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:93a-20: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di /
T02D2690:93a-21: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad pa'o //
T02D2690:93a-22: dge slong de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:93a-23: dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos lnga brgya dang /
T02D2690:93a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
T02D2690:93a-29: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang //
T02D2690:93a-31: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin dang /
T02D2690:93a-32: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /
T02D2690:93a-33: rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dang /
T02D2690:93a-35: gnod sbyin ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2690:93a-36: gnod sbyin mthu bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2690:93a-37: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa lnga brgya dang /
T02D2690:93a-38: mi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang mi rnams la sogs pa'o //
T02D2690:93a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2690:93a-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi mdun du gsungs so //
T02D2690:93a-41: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'bum 'grel dag pa lnga pa /
T02D2690:93a-42: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'grel pa /
